tool_description: Identifies specific emotions expressed in customer feedback beyond basic sentiment, providing detailed emotional tone analysis.

text.description: Customer feedback text to analyze for emotions

emotion_model.description: Emotion detection model: basic_emotions, ekman_6, or plutchik_8

error_messages: Invalid intensity threshold: Value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Text too short: Provide sufficient text for emotion detection.
Empty text: Provide non-empty text for emotion analysis.
usage: Input customer text and select emotion detection model. Configure intensity threshold to filter weak emotion signals. Returns detected emotions with intensity scores.

emotion_scores.description: All detected emotions with their intensity scores

dominant_emotions.description: Top 3 emotions detected in the text
